resources.string:
Excellent communication skills.
 Strong logical and analytical reasoning skills.
 Code proficiency with Java, Android SDK, REST & SOAP APIs, Payment Gateways and Video/Audio libraries.
 Good knowledge of Git practices, Android versions, Android UI/UX, design patterns, code standards and best practices.
 Familiarity with cloud messaging, In-App purchases and Push notifications.
 In Depth knowledge about Android Studio.
 Knowledge of Android Watch and Android TV development is a plus.
Say something about this short video...

Sureshbhai’s name is recognised with much love and reverence by everyone in and around Bhabhar, Gujarat. For over five years now, this man has been the source of happiness and relief for thousands of people who are too poor to afford a single meal. He gives them freshly cooked meals daily and a reason to continue with their lives. But there was a time when Sureshbhai was going through a lot of trouble in his life - he wasn’t sure if he would be able to feed his own family. \n “As soon as I heard the word cancer, I went blank. I couldn’t hear the other words the doctor was saying anymore. Everything around me was a blur. I can’t explain how shocked we both were. We couldn’t believe that our Kaivalya who was playing and active just a few days ago, was now battling such a dangerous disease.” - Ujwala Bhoir, Mother
Enter the 4 digit OTP code send by us
Select the option related to your problem
Get the diagnosis of the disease by taking photos of it

FPO Nirman Adhikari has to create 10 FPOs every month from his job code. After joining 10 farmers, one FPO will be made. If you make 120 FPOs in 12 months, you will get promotion after making 120 FPOs.

FPO monitoring officer has to monitor the farmers included in his FPO to find out which farmers are active and which farmers are not active and he has to motivate them as per their job code, It is mandatory to make one FPO every month. After 400 new FPO are done by your team you will be promoted

FPO Inspecting officer online is to give application to the farmers who are included in FPO and also to inspire the farmers included in their FPO to make another FPO. If you make 240 new FPOs through your old FPO, you will be promoted.

FPO Extension Officer has the task of expanding FPO in his district in which more and more farmers join the company and take training for collective farming. It is mandatory for FPO Extension Officer to create 1 FPO every month from his job code.When 1000 new FPO created with your team. You will be promoted to New Rank

It is the responsibility of the supervisor to promote his FPO so that more and more FPOs are formed in his team and farmers are added to collective farming. It is mandatory for the FPO supervisor to create 1 FPO every month from his job code. You will be promoted when 2000 new FPOs are created from your old team.

FPO manager has the responsibility of promoting his team, hold as many meetings as possible so that your FPO gets promoted and more and more farmers join the company, it is mandatory for the FPO manager to create 1 FPO from his job code every month. You will be promoted once the team creates 4000 new FPOs.

FPO Area managers will hold online meetings with all their junior managers and motivate them to create more and more FPOs. It is mandatory for the FPO Area Manager to create 1 FPO from his job code every month. You will be promoted once you create 7000 new FPOs from your old team.

FPO zonal manager will hold a meeting with all his FPO area managers, FPO managers and supervisors to make as many FPOs as possible. It is mandatory for the FPO Area Manager to create 1 FPO from his job code every month. You will be promoted once you create 10000 new FPOs from your old team.

FPO Area Manager will hold daily online meetings with all his junior field workers to develop his team. It is mandatory for FPO Area Manager to create 1 FPO from his job code every month. You will be promoted once you create 20000 new FPOs from your old team.

FPO State Head Manager will promote all the officials of his team online, so that maximum number of employees can be made on FPO. It is mandatory for the FPO Area Manager to create 1 FPO from his job code every month. You will be promoted once you create 50000 new FPOs from your old team.

FPO Country Head Manager will hold online meeting with managers of every state of the country. It is mandatory for FPO Directorate to create 1 FPO from your job code every month. You will be promoted once you create 100000 new FPOs from your old team.

FPO Directorate will hold online meeting with all its officials every month. It is mandatory for FPO Directorate to create 1 FPO from your job code every month. You will be promoted once 50000 new FPOs are created from your old team.

FPO CMD You have achieved this rank when 1000000 FPOs are created in your team and you do not have to do any work on this rank. Every time 10 lakh new FPOs are created in your team, you will receive Rs 1 crore.

The number of months a person recharges, he will be able to get the job page for the same number of months.
Rs 300 will be reduced by Rs 10 per day. On completion of 30 days, the job page will be blocked and then you will be able to access the page after recharging.
